name: Space Farm
storyline:
You are a farmer on earth, a bright light shines on your barn. Concerned for your livestock you chase the light. Running after it, you get pulled into a tractor beam and forced to survive on a foreign planet. You must farm, collect, fish, and upgrade your way to finding the secret to your escape. You will meet friends, fight foes, and discover stories along the way. Can you solve the mystery of... Space Farm? 
 
SpaceFarm is following in the footsteps of amazing games like Stardew Valley, and any of the Harvest Moon franchise. We are setting out to bring this amazing genre into the next generation. In-depth Storyline, dynamic marketplace, reputation, items, and of course FARMING!
summary: SpaceFarm is following in the footsteps amazing games like Stardew Valley, and any of the Harvest Moon franchise. We are setting out to bring this amazing genre into the next generation. In-depth questing, rewards, leveling, items, battles, mini games, and of course FARMING!
